q: why do they have to cut potatoes
pred: The man is cutting potatoes into small pieces to make them easier to cook. Potatoes are a staple food in many cultures and can be used in various dishes, such as potato salad, mashed potatoes, or roasted potatoes. By cutting them into small pieces, the man can cook them more evenly and quickly, ensuring that they are cooked to the desired level of doneness. Additionally, cutting potatoes into small pieces makes them easier to handle and eat, especially for young children.
